resources.string:
Hi, welcome to GrOwFlO! This app will ensure that flower lovers are able to take care of their plants while doing something they always do: check the weather. Users are able to type in almost every city in the world and are able to get the temperature reading and a message explaing how to take care of their plant in that type of environment.\n\n
Thanks to VClouds @ DevianArt for the weather photos! (http://vclouds.deviantart.com/art/VClouds-Weather-Icons-179152045)
